headline: FROM THE INTERNATIONAL HERALD TRIBUNE; 100, 75, 50 Years Ago
story: 1912 Convicts Mutiny at Prison PARIS — Troops had to be called out and were compelled to make use of their rifles to quell a mutiny at Rochefort prison yesterday [Nov. 19] evening, in the course of which the chief warder and his wife were murdered by the convicts and three other persons were killed. The prisoners attacked the warders with
